players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice was found dead last night, which means one of us is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our accusations and voting today."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that we need to be careful. I think we should observe how everyone behaves today before rushing to any conclusions."
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "Bob, can you share how you conducted your investigation? We need to verify your claim about Diana before making any moves."
You: "I investigated Diana last night and she is mafioso. Charlie, trust me - we need to vote her out today to win."
Diana: "I think Bob is trying too hard to push suspicion onto me without providing any solid proof. If he really investigated me, why is he so eager to reveal it now? Seems like a desperate move."
